ValidationRule.description:
SDT-4113
Work Order Instructions can be changed only if WO Status IN (New, Pending/Draft, Issued, Sent)
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND(ISCHANGED( Instructions__c ), NOT( OR(ISPICKVAL( Status , "New") , ISPICKVAL( Status , "Pending/Draft"), ISPICKVAL( Status , "Issued"), ISPICKVAL( Status , "Sent"))),NOT($User.Bypass_Validation__c))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Work Order Instructions can be changed only if WO Status IN (New, Pending/Draft, Issued, Sent)
